page.title: 16Trade - South Wendron
page.content: We found from our Amenity Count that there was only one food shop in our area - the small Post Office and Stores at Trenear. This made us wonder how people managed to get most of their shopping, so we sent out a questionnaire to our parents. The results showed us that most people did their shopping in Helston, our nearest town, although some did use other towns about 10 miles away, because these had larger stores and Cash and Carry markets. They had to travel there by car and so did a lot of shopping at once so that it was more worth while going. Some people shared transport with friends. Several people said that if a grocery shop opened locally they might use it - if its prices were competitive.
